Description:
"SCORPIONS&#039; drummer Herman Rarebell steps out with some real heavyweights... RATT&#039;s Bobby Blotzer and Juan Croucier, Jack Russell (GREAT WHITE), Steve Marriott (Humble Pie), Charlie Huhn (Ted Nugent, Gary Moore) and Don Dokken are among the stars... an admirable disc to hold over the SCORPION&#039;s fans until their next LP" - Circus Magazine
